verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>me,<s%> "Go <S%H157>again,<s%> love a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> by <S%H7453>another,<s%> and an <S%H5003>adulteress,<s%> even as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H160>loves<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> though they <S%H6437>turn<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H809>cakes<s%> of <S%H6025>raisins.<s%>"
So I <S%H3739>bought<s%> her for myself for <S%H6240>fifteen<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and a <S%H2563>homer<s%> and a <S%H3963>half<s%> of <S%H8184>barley.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3427>her,<s%> "You shall stay with me <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> You shall not play the <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> and you shall not <S%H1961>be<s%> with any other <S%H376>man.<s%> I will also be so toward you."

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> without <S%H4428>king,<s%> and without <S%H8269>prince,<s%> and without <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and without sacred <S%H4676>stone,<s%> and without <S%H646>ephod<s%> or <S%H8655>idols.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> their <S%H4428>king,<s%> and shall come with <S%H6342>trembling<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> and to his <S%H2898>blessings<s%> in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
